abstract: Vonage said that its quarterly loss narrowed and sales rose 64 percent amid a fierce legal battle with Verizon Communications that has left its future in question.
snippet: Vonage said that its quarterly loss narrowed and sales rose 64 percent amid a fierce legal battle with Verizon Communications that has left its future in question.
lead_paragraph: Vonage said yesterday that its quarterly loss narrowed and sales rose 64 percent amid a fierce legal battle with Verizon Communications that has left its future in question.

headline.main: At Vonage, Sales Increase as Litigation Clouds Future
headline.print_headline: At Vonage, Sales Increase As Litigation Clouds Future

abstract: The Internet phone company still lost $72.3 million for the quarter and earned fewer new customers as a legal battle with Verizon cast a cloud.
snippet: The Internet phone company still lost $72.3 million for the quarter and earned fewer new customers as a legal battle with Verizon cast a cloud.
lead_paragraph: Vonage said today that its first-quarter loss narrowed and that sales rose 64 percent despite a fierce legal battle with Verizon Communications that has left the company’s future in question.

headline.main: Vonage Narrows Loss and Increases Sales
